topic.title: HUMAN EPIDERMAL GROWTH FACTOR RECEPTOR STATUS (BREAST)
topic.shortdesc: Where the HUMAN EPIDERMAL GROWTH FACTOR RECEPTOR STATUS FOR BREAST for the initial test is National Code 'Borderline (2+)', a further report will follow with the result of the HUMAN EPIDERMAL GROWTH FACTOR IN SITU HYBRIDISATION RECEPTOR STATUS (BREAST).
